## currencypackage

**currencypackage** provides simple and reusable tools to load currency data 
and perform currency conversions. 

It was developed as part of the *Data and Code Management* group project and 
is used by the dashboard application. 

### Main features 

- Load a processed currency dataset
- Convert an amount between two currencies 
- Convert an amount from a reference currency to all others
